title: Padre Island National Seashore: Operating Guides
body: Guides at the National Seashore       The following is a list of individuals/organizations that are approved to operate as fishing and nature-oriented guides at the National Seashore:    Capt. Blake Muirhead Grey Gator Fishing/Hunting Guide Serv. www.rockportguideservice.com  Lic USCG/TPW Rockport, TX 78382 (361) 790-5203  Capt. Casey A. Barrera, Jr   CC Fishing www.ccfishing.net/Fishing_Report.html  Lic USCG/TPW Corpus Christi, TX 78410 (361) 779-6722    Capt. Fred Lynch Fly Fishing The Flats www.flyfishcorpus.com  Lic USCG/TPW Corpus Christi, TX (361) 533‐4227  Capt.
